amendatorysection.catchline: Diseased animals; destruction; duty to dispose of carcasses.
amendatorysection.para: It shall be the duty of the owner or the custodian of any animal killed by order of the Department of Agriculture to dispose of the carcass in the manner prescribed by the department, and whenever the owner or custodian of any such animal so killed is unknown or absent from the premises where such carcass may be, the carcass shall be disposed of in like manner at the expense of the county in which the carcass is located.
